content:
Emissions from water reservoirs of hydro power plants (PExpy)

Since the calculated Power Density is 19.98 W/m2, hence as per para 39 of the applied methodology (ACMO002 Version 16), PEup, is zero. Verification team has checked the power density calculation and found correct.

27

VCs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

Leakage

According to ACMOO02 version 16.0, no leakage emissions are considered.

Emission reductions

Reductions are calculated as follows:

ERy = BEy - PEy

Where:

ERy = Emission reductions in year y (t CO2e/yr) BEy = Baseline emissions in year y (t CO2e/yr) PEy = Project emissions in year y (t CO2e/yr)

The results of the emission reduction are shown in the table below:

Year Baseline Project Leakage Net GHG emissions or | emissions emissions emission removals or removals | (tCO2e) reductions (tCO2e) (tCO2e) or removals (tCO2e) From 01/07/2022 to 0 0 31/12/2022 462,548 462,548 From 01/01/2023 to 0 0 30/06/2023 449,676 449,676 Total 912,224 Oo Oo 912,224

28

VCs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2
